DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy intense focus ultrasound carbon dioxide-fractionated laser treatment periorbital wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: Fractional Laser vs. Ultrasound Periorbital Wrinkles
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize comparison study compare efficacy micro-focused ultrasound versus fractionate carbon dioxide laser treatment periorbital wrinkle . Subjects meet inclusion exclusion criterion enrol study . The treated site low eyelid lateral orbit . Each side randomize receive 1550nm-fractionated laser treatment one side contralateral side receive micro-focused ultrasound treatment every 6-8 week total 2 treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 3560 year old male female subject moderate low eyelid rhytids crowsfeet 2 . Subjects Fitzpatrick skin type IIII . 3 . Subjects willing , ability understand provide inform consent , able communicate investigator . 1 . Subjects receive injectable softtissue augmentation material face , facial ablative resurfacing , within past 6 month . 2 . Subjects receive injectable botulinum toxin face , nonablative laser treatment face , within past 3 month . 3 . Subjects local infection , open facial wound , significant local skin disease would interfere periorbital treatment energy device . 4 . Subjects allergic lidocaine prilocaine . 5 . Subjects history abnormal scarring treatment area . 6 . Subject ectropion eyelid disfigurement . 7 . Subjects history isotretinoin use precede year 8 . Pregnant lactating individual
